column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=I got my Yeti 575 enduro bike out and had made some minor adjustments to the tuning .
#text=One other adjustment I made was to put some road tires on it so I could ride Capital Circle road of Tallahassee south to the major bike trail .
#text=As I made my way through traffic in the bike lane the wind blew on my face and the sun warmed my skin .
#text=Then all of a sudden the mood was dampened and corrupted by that horrible noise of leaking air .
#text=I had hit some road debree that caused a flat tire .
#text=After cursing the event and going through a small tantrum I consulted the tools of my backpack which I always brought with me .
#text=I took the tire off , removed the tube , isolated the puncture , and then applied the patch .
#text=I reassembled the tube and tire , pumped it up with my small hand pump , and made my way back home .
